Text:
Good game, but crack is not perfect. Whenever a check is made and a movie needs to play, the movie is skipped.
Eg: at the beginning in the motel where you'll need to watch the VHS cassette; or Wendy's ending...
update/correction: this version is working fine, I had downloaded BACKLASH vs who removed important movies...
